add_library(tinyGLTF INTERFACE)

target_include_directories(tinyGLTF INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
target_compile_definitions(tinyGLTF INTERFACE TINYGLTF_NO_STB_IMAGE_WRITE TINYGLTF_NO_EXTERNAL_IMAGE TINYGLTF_NO_INCLUDE_STB_IMAGE_WRITE TINYGLTF_NO_INCLUDE_STB_IMAGE TINYGLTF_USE_CPP14 TINYGLTF_USE_RAPIDJSON TINYGLTF_NO_INCLUDE_RAPIDJSON) 

#define 
#define 
#define
